question: What jobs are available for economists and statisticians working with demographic data?
sql_query1:
SELECT JobPostings.title 
FROM JobPostings
WHERE (JobPostings.Roles = "Economist" OR JobPostings.Roles = "Statistician") AND JobPostings.Data = "Demographics"
sql_query2:
SELECT JobPostings.title 
FROM JobPostings
WHERE JobPostings.Roles = "Economist" OR JobPostings.Roles = "Statistician" AND JobPostings.Data = "Demographics"
interpretation1: Show job posts of economists who work with demographic data and job posts of statisticians who work with the same data type.
interpretation2: What jobs are available for economists and what jobs are available for statisticians working with demographic data?
